categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide fiction

nodes.text: A Brief Visit to Rodia is the introductory narrative to the September 1996 Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide, published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The short story tells of how smugglers Shella Rinou and Kelric sneak onto the planet Rodia in their starship, the Listing Dewback.
